{"id":747404408,"question_id":695,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 11 months","timestamp":1657852134,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/747404408/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"49.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        \n        int height = grid.length;\n        int width = height>0 ? grid[0].length : 0;\n        int max = 0;\n        \n        \n        for(int y=0; y<height; y++){\n            for(int x=0; x<width; x++){\n                \n                if(grid[y][x]==1){\n                    int[] pos = new int[]{y, x};\n                    max = Math.max(max, bfs(pos, grid));\n                }\n                    \n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private int bfs(int[] pos, int[][] grid){\n        Queue<int[]> queue = new LinkedList<>();\n        queue.offer(pos);\n        \n       \n        int max=0;\n        \n        while(!queue.isEmpty()){\n            \n            pos = queue.poll();\n            int y = pos[0];\n            int x = pos[1];\n            // System.out.println(x +\",\"+ y);\n            \n            if(grid[y][x]==1){\n                max++;\n                grid[y][x] = 2;\n                \n                if(y-1>=0 && grid[y-1][x]==1) queue.offer(new int[]{y-1, x});\n                if(x-1>=0 && grid[y][x-1]==1) queue.offer(new int[]{y, x-1});\n                if(y+1<grid.length && grid[y+1][x]==1) queue.offer(new int[]{y+1, x});\n                if(x+1<grid[0].length  && grid[y][x+1]==1) queue.offer(new int[]{y, x+1});\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
